objects.text:
100% Pure & Natural • Rich in Calcium & Vitamin D • No Hormones
Farm-to-Table Freshness • Pasteurized for Safety • High in Protein

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Organic Whole Milk - Pure Goodness in Every Drop
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure & Natural Whole Milk
• Rich in Essential Calcium and Vitamin D
• No Artificial Hormones or Preservatives
• Creamy, Fresh Taste
• Perfect for Drinking, Cooking, and Baking
• Available in Multiple Sizes - Bottle and Pitcher Options
• Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed
• Pasteurized for Safety
• High in Protein and Natural Nutrients
• Ideal for Growing Children and Active Adults

banner_details:
This banner showcases a clean, modern design promoting a dairy product with a fresh and organic theme. The background features a soft, gradient blend of light blues (`#E8F4F8` to `#C5E5F9`) with subtle geometric and wave accents to enhance visual interest without distraction. The main focal point is a central product image (`product_image`), featuring various milk containers with a glossy and natural aesthetic.

At the top, the bold headline (`heading`) uses strong sans-serif typography in deep navy (`#1A5276`), followed by a lighter blue subheading (`subheading`) conveying purity and quality. Below the image, a detailed description (`description`) in a legible serif typeface highlights the health benefits in bullet style.

The price callout (`price`) is prominently displayed in large, strong navy typography, and is followed by a clearly defined call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) with white-on-navy text to draw attention and encourage interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1A5276`
- Light Sky Blue: `#84B6D9`
- Accent Blue: `#2980B9`
- Pale Blue Gradient: `#E8F4F8` to `#C5E5F9`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Text Grey: `#2E4053`
product_color: The product image uses a clean, fresh color palette centered around cool whites and soft blues, conveying purity and freshness—ideal for promoting dairy. The milk appears in a pure white shade, contrasted beautifully by the transparent glass containers with highlights of sky blue. This blue tint is especially evident at the neck and rim of the bottle and pitcher, subtly blending with the white milk to emphasize freshness and coolness. These tones are harmonious and minimalistic, making the product visually appealing. Suggested hex codes: Milky White – #FDFDFD, Soft Blue – #A5C9EA, Glass Grey – #DCE4EC, Light Shadow Grey – #BCCDD6.
